verses.roman:
gopīnāthe dekhāila saba vāsā-ghara
vāṇīnātha-ṭhāñi dila prasāda vistara

synonyms: gopīnāthe—unto Gopīnātha Ācārya; dekhāila—showed; saba—all; vāsā-ghara—residential places; vāṇīnātha-ṭhāñi—unto Vāṇīnātha Rāya; dila—delivered; prasāda vistara—remnants of food in large quantities.
translation: Gopīnātha was then shown all the residential places, and Vāṇīnātha was given large quantities of food [mahā-prasāda] left by Lord Jagannātha.
